name: Social Distance
description: Surrealistrasyon//Şerif Gümüşbaş//Dry crayons drawing//1600x2000pixel//From social distance to social isolation. And about the shelters we can't get out of //Drawing is an impressive language for me with its universal and differentiating structure in every viewer. I also love and use the Automatism method because it's an intimate way of expressing yourself.
